ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: I acknowledge the data providers in the ECA&D project, the World Climate Research Programme ºs Working Group on Regional Climate, and the ESA GlobCover 2009 Project.

sec.title: Availability of data and materials
sec.p: The E-OBS dataset is available from http://www.ecad.eu. The EURO-CORDEX data can be downloaded from links on https://euro-cordex.net/060378/index.php.en. The GlobCover data is available under http://due.esrin.esa.int/page_globcover.php.
